attributes.action: If no other cure cannabis and THC oil has to be the way forward.
attributes.additional_details:
There has been evidence on the program This morning that THC oil has cured a certain type of cancer (not all) but if you are going to die anyway surely it's worth a try? it does not kill you if you use it correctly and I am only asking for it to be prescribed and controlled by doctors.
Why keep someone terminally ill alive as long as you can if you don't try everything possible to cure them? if we did this with animals we would be classed as cruel, so let them try something that may cure them.
attributes.background: When their is no other hope of a cure for cancer patients cannabis and THC oil should be allowed to try . If you have a family member that has terminal cancer you would do anything in your power to try and cure them wouldn't you? .
